item.title: reading
item.description: “If you think about it, the very best books are really just extremely long spells that turn you into a different person for the rest of your life.” Franz Kafka: â€œIf the book we are reading does not wake us, as with a fist hammering on our skulls, then why do we read it? Good God, we also would be happy if we had no books and such books that make us happy we could, if need be, write ourselves.
